lead_paragraph: HELLER--Leon I.,93, January 9, 2016. Survived by sons Michael (Heli) and Stephen (Evelyn), five grandchildren, three great-grandchildren. Predeceased by his wife, Susan, of blessed memory. Former Director of Madison Medical Laboratories. Served as Ritual Director and Vice President of Park Avenue Synagogue. Loved as a man of great intellect, integrity and comedic genius. Funeral 11:00am Monday, Plaza Jewish Community Chapel, 630 Amsterdam Avenue. 1/3
